faqs.question: how to measure dog for clothes
faqs.answer:
Great question! Proper sizing ensures comfort! 📏🐕

**How to measure your dog:**

📐 **Neck circumference** - Around the base of the neck
📐 **Chest circumference** - Around the widest part of the chest
📐 **Back length** - From neck to base of tail
📐 **Belly circumference** - Around the belly (for full coverage)

**Pro tips:**
• Measure when your dog is standing
• Add 1-2 inches for comfort
• Check our size chart for each item

Need help choosing the right size? Just tell me your dog's measurements!

faqs.question: care instructions
faqs.answer:

• Wipe clean regularly
• Check for wear and tear

🐕‍🦺 **M (16-35 lbs)** - Beagle, Cocker Spaniel
🦮 **L (36-65 lbs)** - Labrador, Golden Retriever
🐕‍🦮 **XL (66+ lbs)** - German Shepherd, Great Dane

**Pro Tip:** When in doubt, size up for comfort

What's your pet's weight and breed? I can help you choose the right size!

faqs.question: washing
faqs.answer:
Keep everything clean and fresh! 🧼✨

**Washing Instructions:**
👕 **Clothing** - Cold water, gentle cycle, air dry
🛏️ **Beds** - Remove covers, machine wash cold
🧸 **Toys** - Top rack dishwasher or hand wash
🏷️ **Collars** - Wipe clean, avoid soaking leather
🎒 **Carriers** - Disassemble, wash separately
🍽️ **Bowls** - Dishwasher safe, daily cleaning

**Drying:** Air dry recommended for longevity

Need specific care instructions for any particular item?

⚡ **Quick Resolution** - 3-5 business days

**Not Covered:** Normal wear, damage from misuse
